results.title: Senior Fund Administrator
results.description: A new opportunity has opened with one of our leading finance clients in the Western Cape who is currently looking for a suitable candidate to join their team. results.title: Senior Accountant
results.description: A well-established insurance firm in Cape Town has a vacancy for a Senior Accountant. Candidates must have completed their BCom Accounting and have at least 2 - 3 years experience in an insurance industry with knowledge of Excel and Pastel. A BCom (Hons) or a Postgraduate Diploma would be hugely advantageous. Some of the duties include cashbook, trial balance and general ledgers. Candidates who are analytical, enjoy working with numbers and who thrive under pressure are encouraged to apply.

results.title: Indirect Tax Consultant
results.description: A fast-growing and dynamic auditing company based in Cape Town has a vacancy for an Indirect Tax Consultant. Confident and ambitious candidates who enjoy working with people are encouraged to apply. This position requires the successful candidate to do tax reviews and consult with clients, thus candidates are required to have excellent communication skills and have a good understanding of Tax Law. Qualified CA (SA)s with at least 3 years relevant experience are preferred.

results.title: Claims Consultant
results.description: A new opportunity has just arisen with one of our financial services clients in Centurion, currently looking for a Claims Consultant to join their team The successful candidate will have competed at least 60 FAIS credits as well as their RE5 examination and have a minimum of 2 years aggregate commercial claims experience.

results.title: Claims Team Leader
results.description: Wanting to grow in your career? Want to have the opportunity to manage a team? A new Team leader position has just become vacant with one of our clients in the Pretoria area for a Claims Team Leader. The successful candidate will have passed their RE5 Examination as well as the full 150 FAIS Credits (NQF Level 4 Short Term Insurance) as well as a minimum of 5 years commercial claims experience. Management/leadership experience would be beneficial.

There is a new vacancy for an Internal Audit Manager with one of the Big 4 Firms. Candidates are required to be qualified CA (SA)s, a CIA qualification would be hugely advantageous. Minimum of 5 years experience required. results.description: A leading bank based in the Johannesburg CBD has an exciting new opportunity for a Senior Deal Maker. Only qualified CA (SA)s will be considered for this role. Candidates must have a minimum of 5 years experience and have a great track record in the industry. Individuals with previous Africa experience would be preferred.

Candidates must be qualified CA (SA)s and be studying towards their CFA qualification. At least 3 years post-articles experience is required.
